summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing titles, reallocating, reclassifying, redesignating, retitling and setting compensation for certain positions in various City departments; creating a new salary in the Fire Department; establishing a new position; correcting a position number as shown on Ordinance \#118850; amending S.M.C. 4.13.010 by a 2/3/ vote of the Council to exempt an additional position from the classified service and to delete certain positions from the Exemptions Ordinance; and providing payment therefor.
